feature.label: Feature
feature.description: Spillikin Aerospace file tab plugin for Eclipse.
feature.license:
This is beta software, feel free to share.
If you are upgrading be sure to export your existing sessions first, then import them back using the updated plugin.
Please send mail to me at chrishull42@gmail.com and put "Editor Sessions Plugin" in the subject line to make comments or report bugs.
For full instructions see http://chrishull.com/projects/eclipse You may review the source here at http://github.com/chrishull/github-eclipse
Thanks; -Chris http://chrishull.com
